short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: House Painter is fun addictive arcade puzzle game.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
House Painter is fun addictive arcade puzzle game. Paint the white space on the walls.It can be tricky at time so should have to be make sure that you paint in the right direction.Use arrow keys to paint walls.

You can play on our Pop Adventure website by clicking on the icon.
